explains: adj. 显而易见的，明显的；值得注意的

sentences.en: It is noticeable that women do not have the rivalry that men have.
sentences.cn: 显而易见的是女性没有像男性那样的争强好胜。

sentences.en: It was noticeable how a few people managed to impose their will on the others.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，有少数几个人设法把自己的意志强加于别人。

sentences.en: The class has made noticeable improvement.
sentences.cn: 这个班已有引人注目的进步。
